radiographic_examinations.findings: Focal wall thickening with surrounding stranding involving the sigmoid colon in a region of diverticula, compatible with diverticulitis. There is a small collection of extraluminal air measuring up to 2.9 cm and a tiny extraluminal fluid collection measuring 1.8 x 1.8 cm. Remainder of the colon is notable for diverticulosis. No other significant abnormalities in the liver, pancreas, spleen, kidneys, urinary bladder, or reproductive organs. No evidence of lymphadenopathy or fractures.
